product.title: Fullcome Supply high-power 700W curling iron hair dryer comb household hair styling set
product.title_excluding_brand: Supply high-power 700W curling iron hair dryer comb household hair styling set
product.description: Beauty starts from the "head", and the ten in one multifunctional styling hair straightener has multiple hair styling components. Its hot air can penetrate deep into the hair roots, quickly drying your wet hair. It can also easily create various flowing and romantic hairstyles through flexible combinations. It is a good helper for family hair styling, actually moving the hair salon back home. You are a hairdresser, allowing you to create a beautiful and versatile hair without leaving home, making you more confident, beautiful, and more charming

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
